name: Arcane Chaser
description:
This is my entry for Godot Wild Jam #27

Theme : Books

WIldcard : Tamer

You play as the titular Arcane Chaser, where you explore a strange dungeon where powerful spellbooks and undead warriors roam the corridors ! Being a mage you can cast spells, learn different ones from books, and if you find the knowlege and have enough mana to do so, summon fallen ennemies to help you out in combat.

Controls :

- Keyboard :

Arrowkeys to move,
Q to use your current summon spell (requires mana),
S to dash out of danger (grants i-frames),
D to use your current attack spell.

- Controller :

D-Pad to move,
Y to use your current summon spell (requires mana),
B to dash out of danger (grants i-frames), 
A to use your current attack spell.

Explore the dungeon and reach the exit door to go to the next area, you can collect attack and summon spells, health and mana potions, from fallen enemies and treasure chests, all drops are random, certain ennemies can't drop certain items, only treasure chest can drop all type of items.

That's about all to describe the game :p
